name: Denying Hell
description:
A warrior dies in a bloody war and will end up in hell, there he is taken from his torture by mysterious forces that certainly did not belong to the underworld, these such forces tell him through whispers in his mind that he needs to return, the victim of an evil entity that interfered with the direction destiny should follow.

WASD: Move

J: Normal attack

K: Stronger attack

Left Shift: Dodge

J+K: Ultimate
